name: Pampers Active Fit Size 3 Midi Economy Pack 56
description: Pampers Active Fit nappies offer our best fit and up to 12 hours dryness. With 3 Way Fit they perfectly adapt to fit around the waist, legs and bottom, giving your little one the freedom to play their way. While our strong grips and super stretchy sides make it easy for your baby to move, the nappies are also ultra soft to wrap him in comfort. Use with Pampers Sensitive Maxcare Wipes to gently clean baby's delicate skin.
usage: <Cooking_Instructions><Preparation_and_Usage>To avoid danger of suffocation and/or strangulation, keep all packaging material away from babies and children.</Preparation_and_Usage></Cooking_Instructions>
